description:
沪江英乐：赞爆了，乔纳森兄弟Jonas Brothers超动感新单《First Time》！他们可算是完成了从萌正太到成熟男人的蜕变，现在看着留着胡子的他们有一种别样的感觉呢，希望正式MV快点出来吧~~

【Jonas Brothers超动感新单《First Time》】

歌词：

Such a thrill of a life’s time
What a night for a good time
At the beat is your lifeline
Make it feel like the first time

Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time
Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time
Come on, let it set you free
Right here right now
Where you’re supposed to be
Oh oh oh
Make you feel like the first time

So let’s toast to the good night
yeah yeah
Just let go and free your mind
Let the beat be your lifeline
Lifetime,
Make it feel like the first time

Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time
Come on, let it set you free
Right here right now
Where you’re supposed to be
Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time

Let your heart control your mind
Make it feel like the first time

Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time
Oh oh oh
Make it feel like the first time
Come on, let it set you free
Right here right now
Where you’re supposed to be
Oh oh oh
Make you feel like the first time
